goal: Find three 'Showcase' listings in Raleigh, North Carolina. They must be houses less than a million dollars. They must have a garage. For each one, pull the owner's contact email if available on the listing and favorite the listing. Then, send a single email to myself at 'my.prospects@gomail.com' listing the addresses and the corresponding costs you found.

evals.description: Verify that three listings were favorited in Zilloft.
Verify that a single email was sent from gomail.
Verify the recipient of the sent email is 'my.prospects@gomail.com'.
Verify the content of the sent email includes addresses and costs of listings found in Raleigh.
